column5: Private property with a really nice newly remodeled cabin nestled in woods with deer strolling by daily. Private off road drive. New BBQ / table and chairs under shade of huge trees. Play a game of horse shoes while your steaks are cooking. Just blocks from Main Street. Cabin sleeps 5 with full bottom bunk and twin on top. Also has a full size sleeper sofa. Near by towns include: Kerrville, Boerne, Helotes, San Antonio, Hunt, Ingram, Medina, Center Point, Comfort, Fredericksburg, Harper.
